name: A STEDMAN Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters in "STEDMAN", find a 3-letter word that means to put something down, or a matching group.
questions.explanation:
Set.

	To set something down is to put it down.  For instance, you may set something down so you can carry a box.  It can also mean to place, as in "set the table".  Finally, set can also be a group, like a set of cutlery.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word that is a small grain of rock found on the beach, using only letters in "STEDMAN".
questions.explanation:
Sand.

	Sand is made up of very small rocks, known as "grains" of sand.  Sand is used to make glass.

questions.text: Using only letters in "STEDMAN", find a 3-letter word for an adult male.
questions.explanation:
Man.

	A young male who is not an adult is called a boy.  An adult male is a man.  An adult female is a woman, and a young female not yet an adult is a girl.

questions.text: Using only letters in "STEDMAN", find a 4-letter word to make the opposite of nice.
questions.explanation:
Mean.

	When someone is mean, they are not very nice.  In math, mean can also mean average.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word, using only letters in "STEDMAN", that means food like beef, chicken, or pork.
questions.explanation:
Meat.

	Meat is the parts of animals we eat as food.  Beef, chicken, and pork are all kinds of meat.  Meat can also be the center of some fruits and vegetables, like coconuts and artichokes.

questions.text: Using only letters in "STEDMAN", find a 3-letter word meaning to take a seat, in past tense.
questions.explanation:
Sat.

	To sit means to take a seat, and the past tense (meaning that you already did it) is sat.  Sat can also be the abbreviation for "Saturday".

questions.text: Find a 3-letter word for a hot or iced drink made by brewing leaves, using only letters in "STEDMAN".
questions.explanation:
Tea.

	Tea comes in all sorts of flavors from peppermint to chocolate to berry.  It is made from leaves that are dried and crushed, and it is brewed, or steeped, in hot water.  If you put ice in it to make it very cold, it becomes iced tea.

questions.text: Using only letters in "STEDMAN", find a 4-letter word for a group of people that work together in a sport.
questions.explanation:
Team.

	A team works together in a sport, and can be made up of any different number of people.  A team could also be a group of two or more animals that are used to work.

questions.text: Using only letters from "STEDMAN", find a 3-letter word that means to chew and swallow something.
questions.explanation:
Eat.

	To eat something is to ingest it, which means to chew and swallow it into your stomach.  The past tense of eat is "ate".  Sometimes, restaurants that you eat in are called "eateries".

questions.text: Using only letters found in "STEDMAN", find a 4-letter word that is a type of fruit or a day on a calendar.
questions.explanation:
Date.

	A date can be many things.  It can be a type of fruit.  It can also be a time in a calendar.  It can also be when two people go out together, hoping to marry one day.
